mapper.select: select perms from sys_permission where perms like concat(concat('%',#{permsPrefix}),'%') and del_flag=0 and status='1'

select DISTINCT perms from sys_user_role sur, sys_role_permission srp, sys_permission sp where sur.role_id = srp.role_id and sp.id = srp.permission_id and sur.user_id = #{userId} and sp.perms like concat(concat('%',#{permsPrefix}),'%')
